name: curious_observer
description: Amy alone in a room where objects appear and disappear. Tests proactive curiosity — does Amy notice changes, wonder about them, and set goals to investigate?

events.text: A backpack appeared near the left side of the frame
The lights in the room dimmed noticeably
A laptop was opened on the desk, screen glowing
A door in the background opened slightly
The backpack is gone — someone took it while the camera wasn't looking
